name: qeegmodfileparser
description: A starting point to create ES6 module for browser

scripts.build-min:
npm run build && printf "// Build date: $(date '+%Y-%m%-dT%H:%M:%S')

" > dist/qeegmodfileparser.min.js && cat header.txt >> dist/qeegmodfileparser.min.js && google-closure-compiler-js dist/qeegmodfileparser.js >> dist/qeegmodfileparser.min.js

author: Jonathan Lurie
